FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
FAQ.subtitle: Answers to common questions about the job application process at Environesia.

questions.q: What should I prepare before applying?
questions.a: Make sure you have your latest CV (Curriculum Vitae) in PDF format, a cover letter (optional), and a portfolio if the position requires it.

questions.q: How long does the recruitment process usually take?
questions.a: Our recruitment process usually takes 2-4 weeks from the closing date of the vacancy, but this can vary. We will provide the latest information via email.

questions.q: Can I apply for more than one position?
questions.a: Yes, you can apply for up to 3 different positions at the same time. However, we recommend focusing on the position that best suits your qualifications.

questions.q: Who can I contact if I have questions?
questions.a: If you have any questions, feel free to contact our recruitment team via email at careers@environesia.co.id.
